title: Tighten that wire!  Tighten that wire hard!

tasks.task: Tightening barbed wire using a wire tightener
subtasks: Approach the loose strand of barbed wire
Position the wire tightener on the loose barbed wire
Operate the wire tightener to tighten the barbed wire
Ensure the barbed wire is tight as a banjo string
